I enjoy playing thicc tanky champs - alistar, ornn, gragas... and as a morbidly obese player when they call me or my champion fat I cannot in good conscience be offended, as one cannot be shamed for what one does not view as shameful. I just laugh. I am fat, and I feel no shame. I'm just me. There are people starving in this world, but I have overcome starvation. I also drink alot, most of the alcoholic drinks i make have limes. I view this as successfully warding off scurvy. I consider myself lucky. As 'Fluffy' says, "I don't wanna die sore, I wanna die full." YMMV.
